selected_links.title: Report a missed waste collection | Calderdale Council
strengths: Specific page dedicated to reporting missed waste collections
Clear instructions on how and when to report a missed collection
selected_links.reasoning: This page provides detailed instructions for reporting a missed waste collection and includes a reminder of the 48-hour time limit, making it highly relevant for council customer information needs.

context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reason.reasoning: The content does provide a clear instruction on what to do when reporting a missed collection - allow crews until 5pm on the day of collection before submitting a report. However, it does not specify how or where to report a missed collection, which would be crucial information for the resident.
Reason.next_actions: I would look for more details and contact information for reporting a missed collection, either through the link provided in the content ('For more details, please see: Household collections') or other channels.

analysis.overall_assessment: The content provides some useful information but it could be better if it also included clear instructions on how and where to report a missed collection.
